skill.name: project-planning
skill.description: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept description. Use when starting a new project, when docs/planning/ contains placeholder files, or when user requests project planning document generation.
skill.summary: Generate initial project planning documents (PVS, ADR, Tech Spec, Roadmap) from a project concept de...
skill.author: ByronWilliamsCPA

security_audit.summary: This is a documentation-focused skill that generates project planning templates. It includes a Python validation script that operates only within the docs/planning/ directory, with no network access, credential handling, or system modification capabilities.

low_findings.title: Python script execution in skill
low_findings.description: The skill includes a Python validation script (scripts/validate-planning-docs.py) that executes when users run validation commands. The script reads/writes files in docs/planning/ directory and uses Path.cwd() for path resolution. While scoped to project documentation, script execution carries inherent risk.

content.value_statement: Starting a new project without clear documentation leads to scope creep and architectural drift. This skill generates four essential planning documents (Vision, Architecture Decisions, Technical Spec, Roadmap) to guide AI-assisted development and maintain context across sessions.
actual_capabilities: Generate Project Vision & Scope document from concept description
Create Architecture Decision Records (ADRs) with rationale
Produce Technical Implementation Specification with tech stack
Build phased Development Roadmap with milestones
Validate planning documents for completeness and consistency
limitations: Does not execute code or modify project files outside docs/planning/
Requires user to review and validate generated content
Does not integrate with external project management tools
Requires zen-mcp-server for consensus review feature

use_cases.title: New project kickoff
use_cases.description: Generate complete planning documents when starting a new Python project with Claude Code

use_cases.title: Architecture decisions
use_cases.description: Document key technical choices (database, auth, API design) with ADRs for future reference

use_cases.title: Phase-based roadmaps
use_cases.description: Create structured development timelines with milestones, tasks, and success criteria

prompt_templates.title: Start planning
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate planning documents for my project: [describe your project concept]

prompt_templates.title: Validate documents
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the validation script to check if my planning documents are complete and consistent

prompt_templates.title: Synthesize plan
prompt_templates.prompt: Synthesize my planning documents into PROJECT-PLAN.md with phase branches

prompt_templates.title: Review document
prompt_templates.prompt: Review my [document type] document using consensus and tell me if it is ready for the next step

output_examples.input: Generate planning documents for a personal finance CLI tool in Python
output: Review status: PVS READY, ADR READY, Tech Spec READY, Roadmap READY

best_practices: Review each generated document for accuracy before proceeding
Use consensus review to validate document quality before moving to next phase
Update documents as the project evolves to prevent architectural drift
anti_patterns: Generating documents without reviewing content for project-specific details
Skipping ADR creation and making undocumented architectural decisions
Using generated documents without validating against actual project constraints

faq.question: What tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires zen-mcp-server for consensus review.

faq.question: How many documents does it generate?
faq.answer: Creates four documents: Project Vision & Scope, ADR, Tech Spec, and Development Roadmap.

faq.question: Can I customize the templates?
faq.answer: Yes. Edit templates in templates/ directory to match your project standards.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only reads and writes to docs/planning/ directory. No data leaves your machine.

faq.question: What if validation fails?
faq.answer: The script reports specific issues. Fix placeholders, add missing sections, and re-run validation.

faq.question: How is this different from other planning tools?
faq.answer: Designed specifically for AI-assisted development with context loading patterns and cross-document references.
